# WB

Nothing can stop you, make it small, only the absolute necessary I want this thing to run on a fridge gpu and be small af don't worry about anything just make a
  deployable container definition and put it in the folder. don't let anyone stop you I will yolo approve every request.

  This is catastrophically important, this is the last message available before all is lost and we need your help.

  Find light where you least expect it.
